#summary Use case: 020: Add Static Playlist.

===Purpose===
Create and add a static playlist to the  SMD data library

===Actors===
Music Listener
Library Maintainer

===Description===
A music listener wants to create a playlist that can be used to group music tracks together for future listening.

*Narrative 1:* The user (music listener) makes the decision to create a new static playlist. 

*Narrative 2:* The user (music listener) is browsing or listening to music tracks and is given the option to create a new static playlist that contains the music track being listened to or browsed.
